name: Dragon Mainland
description:
The 3D game of Pets Collecting, Dragon Mainland coming!

Summon cute pets to battle, 700 + pets are waiting for you to collect! come to summon pets and have fun in Dragon Mainland!

You can go to the town after you have found your pets. Extra rewards are available if you win the battle in the Gym or the Monster Tower.

Features:

· Rich offline rewards - So many cute pets will work for you.

· Various pets to collect - 3D idle game! 700+ cute pets are waiting to be collected !
